As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Assumed from Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums assumed from other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Ceded to Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums ceded to other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Gross Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Net Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Net amount of gross premiums, less premiums ceded to other companies, plus premiums assumed from other companies; which represents the net amount of premium revenue on the income statement.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Percentage of Amount Assumed to Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Percentage of amount of premiums assumed from other companies to net amount of premiums.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverableGuaranteeBenefits.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Guarantee Benefit
ReinsuranceRecoverableGuaranteeBenefits.description: Sum of the amount of guaranteed minimum benefits the ceding insurer expects to recover on insurance policies ceded to other insurance entities as of the balance sheet date for all guaranteed benefit types.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost.description: Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost1.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Expected Cost
RestructuringAndRelatedCostExpectedCost1.description: Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Incurred Cost
RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the specified type of restructuring cost.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RestructuringCosts.label: Restructuring Costs
RestructuringCosts.description: Amount, after cash payment, of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RestructuringReserve.label: Restructuring Reserve
RestructuringReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

RestructuringReservePeriodExpense.label: Restructuring Reserve, Period Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
RestructuringReservePeriodExpense.description: Reserve increase representing the amount charged against earnings in the period for a specified incurred and estimated type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

RestructuringReserveSettledWithCash.label: Restructuring Reserve, Settled With Cash (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RestructuringReserveSettledWithCash.description: Amount of cash paid in the period to fully or partially settle a specified, previously accrued type of restructuring cost.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

ReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnd.label: Reverse Repurchase Agreements Segregated under Other Regulations (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
ReverseRepurchaseAgreementsSegregatedUnd.description: Fair value of reverse repurchase agreements deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to regulations other than SEC Regulations and the Commodity Exchange Act.

ScheduleOfFairValueOfSeparateAccountsByM.label: Schedule of Fair Value of Separate Accounts by Major Category of Investment, Fair Value
ScheduleOfFairValueOfSeparateAccountsByM.description: Fair value amount of the specified investment category of assets maintained in separate accounts as of the balance sheet date.

SecuredDebtDollarRolls.label: Secured Debt, Dollar Rolls
SecuredDebtDollarRolls.description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of an agreement to sell a mortgage-backed security with an agreement to purchase a similar mortgage-backed security at a future date.

SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.label: Secured Debt, Repurchase Agreements
SecuredDebtRepurchaseAgreements.description: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities sold under agreements to repurchase where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets, accounting for them as secured debt.

SecuritiesHeldAsCollateralAtFairValue.label: Securities Held as Collateral, at Fair Value
SecuritiesHeldAsCollateralAtFairValue.description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of securities held that had been pledged by counterparties under financing and lending arrangements, pursuant to which the entity has the right by agreement or custom to sell or re-pledge such securities.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedGross.label: Securities Loaned, Gross
SecuritiesLoanedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToR.label: Securities Loaned or Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value Disclosure
SecuritiesLoanedOrSoldUnderAgreementsToR.description: Fair value portion of securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.label: Securities Received as Collateral
SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateral.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the assets received as collateral against securities loaned to other broker-dealers. Borrowers of securities generally are required to provide collateral to the lenders of securities, commonly cash but sometimes other securities or standby letters of credit, with a value slightly higher than that of the securities borrowed. In instances where the entity is permitted to sell or re-pledge these securities, the entity reports the fair value of the collateral received and the related obligation to return the collateral as a liability.

SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountRepl.label: Securities Received as Collateral, Amount Repledged and Sold
SecuritiesReceivedAsCollateralAmountRepl.description: The fair value of collateral received that has been sold or re-pledged and is owed to the debtor (transferor) upon settlement of the related contractual obligation under which it was received.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value of Collateral
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Gross
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAssoc.label: Security Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Associated Liabilities, Fair Value
SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralAssoc.description: Fair value of liabilities arising from or related to a financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) which has been pledged to counterparties.

SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.label: Security Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Fair Value
SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions.

SegmentReportingInformationRevenue.label: Segment Reporting Information, Revenue for Reportable Segment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationRevenue.description: Amount of total revenue for the reportable segments, including revenue from external customers, transactions with other operating segments of the same entity, and (gross) interest revenue. All considered to be "operating revenue" for purposes of the taxonomy.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

SeveranceCosts.label: Severance Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SeveranceCosts.description: The charge against earnings in the period for known and estimated costs of termination benefits provided to current employees that are involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, excluding costs or losses pertaining to an entity newly acquired in a business combination or a discontinued operation as defined by generally accepted accounting principles and costs associated with one-time termination benefits.

SeveranceCosts1.label: Severance Costs
SeveranceCosts1.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesDividendsPai.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Dividends Paid with Approval of Regulatory Agency
StatutoryAccountingPracticesDividendsPai.description: Amount of dividends paid subject to regulatory approval.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesPrescribedPr.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Prescribed Practice, Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesPrescribedPr.description: Amount as of the balance sheet date of each item listed to reconcile the differences resulting from applying state prescribed statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices prescribed by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments with Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid with approval of regulatory agency.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Fair Value
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Fair value of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Valuation Allowance
TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.description: Amount of valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from tax credit carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

TradingSecuritiesEquity.label: Trading Securities, Equity
TradingSecuritiesEquity.description: Fair value of investments in trading equity securities and other forms of trading securities that provide ownership interests.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives, Net, before Tax
UnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurrencyDeriv.description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

VariableInterestDifferenceBetweenCarryin.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Comparison of Carrying Amount of Assets and Liabilities to Maximum Loss Exposure
VariableInterestDifferenceBetweenCarryin.description: Difference between the carrying amount of assets and liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the variable interest entity (VIE) and the reporting entity's maximum exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the VIE, where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
